sentences.sentence: We motored over to Cambridge to see some friends.
sentences.translation: 我们开汽车去剑桥看一些朋友。

sentences.sentence: On the morning of 28 February, we motored three hours out to sea.
sentences.translation: 2月28号上午，我们在海面上航行了三个小时。

sentences.sentence: Cars motored past our front yard on their way to the Jumhuriya Bridge a couple of miles up the road.
sentences.translation: 车辆隆隆地从我们前院驶过，开向几里路外的Jumhuriya大桥。
